title: How to use WhatsApp in BlackBerry - Quora

response.answer_text: You know that several problems are faced during android whatsapp such as app is not connecting with internet. I think You must update your Blackberry OS to latest version.Which supports more android apps. Then you can download whatsapp from anywhere and can install and use. New OS can provide more facilities and requirements for th whatsapp and solve many problems. So you don't need to install patched whatsapp from patched playstore.
